mapper.select: WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 from cur_assets_package_temp m where t.id = m.id and m.is_exception = 1)
mapper.update: update cur_assets_package_temp set is_exception = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as insertCount from cur_assets_package_temp t WHERE t.import_batch_no = #{importBatchNo} and t.is_exception = '0'
mapper.update: update cur_assets_package_temp set is_exception = 2 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: WHERE t.import_batch_no = #{importBatchNo} and t.is_exception = '0'
WHERE t.import_batch_no = #{importBatchNo} and t.is_exception = '2'
SELECT count(1) as total from cur_assets_package_temp t WHERE t.is_exception = '3' and t.import_batch_no = #{importBatchNo}
select t.id, t.org_casNo AS orgCasno, '案件不存在'as msg from cur_assets_package_temp t WHERE t.is_exception = '3' and t.import_batch_no = #{importBatchNo}
SELECT count(1) as total from cur_assets_package_temp t WHERE t.is_exception = '0' and t.import_batch_no = #{importBatchNo}
WHERE t.is_exception = '0' and t.import_batch_no = #{importBatchNo}
